column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to [[Rayner Unwin]]'''.

column1: *'''Subject:''' Reply to a letter from Rayner Unwin from [[19 April]] [[1966]]
column2: concerning a new dust-jacket design for ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and material for inclusion in ''[[The Tolkien Reader]]''.

column1: *'''Publication:''' Extracts from the letter were published in ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide]]''.
*'''Archive:''' Tolkien-[[Allen and Unwin|George Allen & Unwin]] archive
